ISSUE.TITLE: dataObject definitions fails in xml with laneSet
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Hi, when I define a data object as part of my process, the process can be deployed successful, but the data object definitions didn't work well. And when I download the XML file, there are no data object label on XML file. By the way, when the process use laneSet, the issue appears. What did I use wrong?

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #1372 #1217 issues pool and lane Missing EventListeners Messages and dataproperties fixed (#1384) * pool and lane Missing EventListeners Messages and dataproperties fixed * add a unit test showing the JSON conversion logic is ok
